titel: Masai School Courses - Fees & ISA
description: We believe that potential is evenly distributed across Indian society, but opportunity is not. Masai is democratising education with a unique Income Share Agreement(ISA). ISA allows you to study the course of your choice at INR 0 upfront fee.
subDescription: You pay us only if you get a job of INR 5,00,000/- per year (CTC) or more, after course completion.
keywords: Fees & ISA We believe that potential is evenly distributed across Indian society, but opportunity is not. Masai is democratising education with a unique Income Share Agreement(ISA). ISA allows you to study the course of your choice at INR 0 upfront fee.  You pay us only if you get a job of INR 5,00,000/- per year (CTC) or more, after course completion.   Income-Share Agreement (ISA) ISA is a legal contract that makes Masai education outcome based. It is not an education loan, as you do not have to pay any interest rate & you don’t require collaterals. If you do not get placed within 1 year of studying, your education at Masai is completely free.  How Does Our ISA Work? 1 Income Share Agreement is a way for us to invest in your future and success. That means that we as an institution succeed only if you succeed as a developer. Here is how: rupee-symbol 5LPA (CTC)  You pay us only if you get a job of INR 5,00,000/- per year (CTC) or more, after course completion.  calender-symbol 1 Year  If you don’t get placed within 1 year after course completion, you pay nothing for learning at Masai.  bolt-symbol Enforcement  In the event you are not working or if your income drops below 5LPA, the ISA payments pause.*  2 Course Fees These only take effect once you start earning ₹5,00,000/- (CTC) or more.  Full Time Courses Full Stack Web Development : 3,00,000/- * *including taxes, if applicable  Part Time Courses Full Stack Web Development : 2,50,000/- * Data Analytics: 2,00,000/- * *including taxes, if applicable  Monthly Payable Table For Full Stack Web Development Full Time Course  Your salary range (CTC)*  Less than 5 LPA  5 - 6.99 LPA  7 - 8.99 LPA  9 - 11.99 LPA  12 LPA & above  YOUR SALARY RANGE (CTC)*  5 - 6.99 LPA  MONTHLY PAYABLE AMOUNT  INR 8333  TENURE (IN MONTHS)  36  TOTAL PAYABLE FEE (INCLUDING TAXES, IF APPLICABLE)   3,00,000/-  CTC (Cost to Company) is defined as the total gross income earned, including but not limited, to variable pay, compensations and ESOPs. Find out more in the FAQ section.  This table is for Full Stack Web Development (Full Time) Course only. Reach out to us at admissions@masaischool.com to know more.  * Terms and Conditions apply  3 Drop Out Clauses If you realise that Masai is not for you, you may withdraw from our courses at anytime. Here is how the fee works in case you drop-out:  Dropout Clause Frequently asked Questions   What is an ISA and how does it work?   Can I see a copy of the ISA? titel: Masai School Courses - About Us
description: Masai is an outcome driven career school. Our mission is to skill India’s untapped & underutilized talent, and to train them for some of the most in-demand jobs in the world. We are introducing a new model of higher education in which we, Masai, invest in our students’ future and success. As India’s fastest growing career institute, Masai has one goal: unlocking the human potential of India by making our education system outcome driven.
keywords: About Us Masai is an outcome driven career school. Our mission is to skill India’s untapped & underutilized talent, and to train them for some of the most in-demand jobs in the world. We are introducing a new model of higher education in which we, Masai, invest in our students’ future and success. As India’s fastest growing career institute, Masai has one goal: unlocking the human potential of India by making our education system outcome driven.   The Masai Story quote-openquote-close What if educational institutions shared the monetary risks their students take on when they invest in higher education? Our Co-Founder & CEO, Prateek Shukla was teaching with Teach For India during his pre-final year at IIT Kanpur and stumbled upon the education problem in India and how under-tapped India’s true potential is. During a vacation to Kenya and Tanzania a few years later, he met with the Chieftain of the Maasai Mara Tribe. He learnt about the robust skilling techniques the tribe follows to keep themselves always able and self-sustained.  Back in India, he realised that every technology company spends about 6 months in training their new recruits before they move on to contribute to the organisational goals. Finding an opportunity to help upskill Bharat, Prateek got Nrupul Dev and Yogesh Bhat together to start Masai School in June 2019. They set out to build a military-style coding institute, based on the 9-9-6 intensive training regime that runs for 6 days in a week from 9am to 9pm. The holistic program includes 1200 hours of hands-on coding, 100 hours of soft skills training, 100 hours of mathematics and more.  Since, Masai has grown at a staggering rate. With thousands of enrolled students, Masai School is leading the Outcome Driven Education Revolution in India with new courses like Data Analytics now part of our offering.  alternative image 2019sunshine  We Started Our Journey  7000+  underline-svg Students Currently Enrolled  30+  Total Batches  96%  Placement Rate  * Post course completion & accreditation by Masai.  1400+  Hiring Partners  Meet Your Instructors The Curriculum Team is a group of instructors with extensive industry and training experience in some of India’s top companies. description: Our Investors When outcomes drive you, the industry stands with you.
keywords: Our Investors When outcomes drive you, the industry stands with you.  Stalwarts Of The Tech Industry By Our Side  It is not easy to find the right talent for engineering & data teams in the Indian technology ecosystem even at an entry-level, and it is a problem that impacts the best of the best organisations. While Masai is an outcome-driven higher education institution, we still need the industry to support an alternative education system such as ours. The time has finally come for the technology industry to come together and invest in India’s talent. Cohort-based courses, like Masai, are yielding high-quality talent with industry-level skills better than any degrees.
